Interface GlobalConstants

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MoveGen

    public interface GlobalConstants
    An interface to dump all the constants required in the chess engine. Any class which wants to access these variables should just do an 'implements GlobalConstants'.
    Author:
    ranuva

      static long KNIGHT_SPAN
      8*8 board: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - A - A - - - - A - - - A - - - - - K - - - - A - - - A - - - - A - A _ This number will set all A's to 1, rest zeros So, if we shift this number left or right, we get the attack positions of knight from various location.

      • KNIGHT_SPAN

        static final long KNIGHT_SPAN
        8*8 board: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - A - A - - - - A - - - A - - - - - K - - - - A - - - A - - - - A - A _ This number will set all A's to 1, rest zeros So, if we shift this number left or right, we get the attack positions of knight from various location.
